name: BIL_PROV_SEC_ID
description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record.  The BIL_PROV_SEC_ID table holds secondary (legacy) identifiers for the billing provider.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: BIL_PROV_SEC_QUAL
columns.description: This item holds the qualifier for the billing provider secondary ID. It is used on both electronic and paper claims.

columns.name: BIL_PROV_SEC_ID
columns.description: This item holds the billing provider secondary ID for the current payor. It is used on both electronic and paper claims.

columns.name: BIL_PROV_SEC_QUAL_OID
columns.description: The ID for the list of possible billing provider ID types.
